✨ 𝑨 𝑹𝒆𝒂𝒍 𝑳𝒊𝒇𝒆 𝑯𝒐𝒈𝒘𝒂𝒓𝒕𝒔 𝑪𝒂𝒔𝒕𝒍𝒆 ✨
.
Come visit a real life Hogwarts Castle! This is actually the incredible Abbey of Mont-Saint-Michel in France! 🇫🇷 The entire historic site really looks like a town out of Harry Potter. ✨
.
📍Mont-Saint-Michel, France 
.

A dream of mine has always been to visit Mont-Saint-Michel in France ✨🇫🇷Now we can check it off the bucket list! 🙏🏻
.
✨ A UNESCO heritage site, Mont-Saint-Michel is perched on a rocky islet where it experiences the full force of tides. It’s the 3rd most visited monument in France, just after the Eiffel Tower and Versailles! 🇫🇷
.
✨ In extreme high tide, the mountain becomes a virtual island, and in low tide you can walk out on to the endless sandbed 
.
✨Check the tide schedule to plan your visit (highest tides are usually after the full moon) 🌝Also be safe because the tides can change very quickly — I watched many horror stories of people being caught in the flood 
.
✨ You can visit the beautiful Abbey at the top of the city. It’s free on the first Sunday of the month!
.
✨ We went low season and it was the best decision ever. We got to explore all the hidden alleys and run around the top of the ramparts without the crowds and had the city to ourselves! 🙌🏻
.
.
.
.

✨ 𝒀𝒖𝒍𝒆 𝑩𝒂𝒍𝒍 𝑪𝒆𝒍𝒆𝒃𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 ✨
.
Ever dream of attending the Yule Ball? ❄️ For the first time ever the iconic Yule Ball from the @wizardingworld is being hosted in multiple cities across the world! ⚡️
.
➡️ @Fever_Global invited us to attend the @HarryPotterYuleBallCelebration in Montreal, Canada and here are some of our thoughts 💡Save these tips for later ❤️:
.
✨ Dress in your best ball gown and wizarding robe attire! It really brings the ball to life when everyone goes all out ❄️
.
✨ The actors were amazing and great at engaging the crowd! They do mini performances and even teach you dance moves! 💃
.
✨ The location in Montreal was absolutely stunning - 5/5. Le Salon 1861 was converted from an old church. What was missing which 💯 should have been there was the ice castle set
.
✨ Manage your time! ⏰ The biggest con is that the event is only 2h30!! For the price it is expensive. In order to not feel rushed:
.
✨ Buy your drinks later! 🥂 The line was huge at the beginning and wastes time. We picked up our drinks near the end when there was no wait.
.
✨ Eat before! Food is expensive and imo not worth waiting for. The Montreal location did have Beaver Tails, a Canadian specialty so the food varies by location 🇨🇦
.
✨There are two types of admission packages: standard or premium. Standard from $85 to $95. Premium from $95 to $125 includes “priority access entry,” a complimentary drink, and a gift. 
.
✨ Overall we had a fantastic time ! Reviews vary by location but I have to say the Montreal location hit it out of the park 👏🏻 Given that the event was only 2h, the price ideally should have been lower. However your experience is also 💯 influenced by the crowd 👇🏻
.
✨We had an awesome group where everyone was engaged and dressed to the 9s in full on ball gowns, robes, or cosplay. We were lucky we had Dumbledore, Mcgonagall and Snape chaperoning us! 😂 For a random afternoon session, it felt like we were dancing the night away and really did feel magical ✨ Check out our stories for a more detailed review! 
.
📍 Salon 1861 Montreal, Quebec 
.
.
.
.
.
#HPYuleBallCelebration #YuleBall #Fever #wizardingworldstyle #hogwarts #triwizardtournament

✨𝑯𝒂𝒓𝒓𝒚 𝑷𝒐𝒕𝒕𝒆𝒓 𝑨𝒅𝒗𝒆𝒏𝒕 𝑪𝒂𝒍𝒆𝒏𝒅𝒂𝒓 ✨

It’s December 1st so Christmas countdown begins! Check out this cool festive pop-up Hedwig advent calendar from @insighteditions 🎄🎅🏻 [ad-pr]
.
✨Amazing pop-up engineering that leads to the calendar magically transforming into a beautiful pop-up tree centerpiece! 🎄✨
.
✨25 days of Harry Potter “gifts” that you can read about (it’s more of an information pop up rather than getting actual gifts) Personally I wish there was a bit of chocolate or something 😂
.
✨ Pop-ups created by paper engineer Matthew Reinhart who also did titles like Harry Potter: A Pop-Up Guide to Hogwarts👏🏻
.
✨Overall it’s very interactive! I wish there were actual gifts but the pop up engineering is incredible and very impressive looking! 👌🏻🎄❤️
.
.
. 
.
.
@insighteditions @wizardingworld #wizardingworldstyle  #hogwarts #harrypotter #harrypotterfilm #hedwig #christmas #christmasathogwarts #adventcalendar

Going back to Hogwarts today!!! So excited to be back at @universalorlando and this time with my whole family! 🥰 We have lots of fun things planned for the next few days so stay tuned! 🙌🏻 We will be kicking off tonight with the @orlandoinformer event! What would you guys like to see? 
.

✨ Xmas decorations everywhere 🎄✨

✨  Grinchmas Who-liday Spectacular 🙌🏻

Thank you @myharrypottercorner for this awesome photo!! So honoured to have a magical portrait by you! ❤️

It’s our last day at Hogwarts @universalorlando❤🎄 what a great way to kick off the holidays with spending time at @wizardingworld with my family! We had an amazing trip and can’t wait to come back again! I’m so glad my whole family are die-hard Harry Potter fans. All 4 houses represented here! ❤️💛💙💚
.
Comment on your house below!👇🏻🥰
.

✨ 𝑻𝒉𝒆 𝑼𝒏𝒊𝒄𝒐𝒓𝒏 𝑫𝒆𝒇𝒆𝒏𝒅𝒔 𝑯𝒊𝒎𝒔𝒆𝒍𝒇✨
.
On my way to Slughorn’s Christmas Party!🎄Just wanted an excuse to prance around in one of the most magical dresses I’ve seen! 🥰✨ When I saw that the print of this @selkie dress was part of the unicorn tapestry series featured in the Harry Potter films I could not resist. 🦄 
.
The Hunt of the Unicorn or the Unicorn Tapestries is a series of seven tapestries made in South Netherlands around 1495-1505. The series features a group of noblemen and hunters in pursuit of a unicorn. If I didn’t have the Black family wallpaper I would have wallpapered my entire Harry Potter room with this tapestry print because it’s so incredibly beautiful! This print is “The Unicorn Defends Himself” whereas in the films “The Unicorn in Captivity” is briefly featured. 🦄
.
📍 Universal Orlando 
.
.
.
.
.

.
@harrypotterfilm @wizardingworld #harrypotter #harrypotterbooks #selkie #harrypotterfilm #harrypotterfan #universalorlando #wizardingworld #unicorn #slughorn #slughornchristmasparty #darkacademia

.
 Here are some of my favourite Harry Potter ornaments that I came across @universalorlando❤🎄 Which one is your fav?👇🏻🥰
.
All of these are available at the Port of Entry Christmas Shoppe on IOA, where it’s holiday cheer 365 days a year! I would love to do a full Harry Potter Christmas tree some day but these do run you a pretty penny! Ornaments range from $15-30. But they are gorgeous 😍😍
.
.
.

✨ 𝑯𝒐𝒈𝒔𝒎𝒆𝒂𝒅𝒆 𝒂𝒕 𝑪𝒉𝒓𝒊𝒔𝒕𝒎𝒂𝒔 ✨
.
 “𝘏𝘰𝘨𝘴𝘮𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘦 𝘭𝘰𝘰𝘬𝘦𝘥 𝘭𝘪𝘬𝘦 𝘢 𝘊𝘩𝘳𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘮𝘢𝘴 𝘤𝘢𝘳𝘥; 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘵𝘭𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵𝘤𝘩𝘦𝘥 𝘤𝘰𝘵𝘵𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘴𝘩𝘰𝘱𝘴 𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘤𝘰𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘯 𝘢 𝘭𝘢𝘺𝘦𝘳 𝘰𝘧 𝘤𝘳𝘪𝘴𝘱 𝘴𝘯𝘰𝘸; 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘩𝘰𝘭𝘭𝘺 𝘸𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘩𝘴 𝘰𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘥𝘰𝘰𝘳𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘦𝘯𝘤𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘵𝘦𝘥 𝘤𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘭𝘦𝘴 𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘨𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘵𝘳𝘦𝘦𝘴.” 🎄✨
.
Christmas at @universalorlando is my favourite time of the year and Hogsmeade looks exactly like a Christmas card!❤🎄 Here’s a closer look at all the beautiful decorations around town. What are your plans for the holidays? 🎅🏻
.
.
.
@universalorlando @harrypotterfilm #harrypotter #universalstudios #universalorlando #wizardingworldofharrypotter #hogwarts #potterhead #harrypotterfilm #harrypottermerch #harrypottercollection #pottermania #pottermore #wizardingworld #harrypotterworld #wizardingfamily #houseprideday #gryffindor #slytherin #hufflepuff #ravenclaw #christmas

✨ 𝑶𝒓𝒍𝒂𝒏𝒅𝒐 𝑰𝒏𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒎𝒆𝒓 𝑴𝒆𝒆𝒕𝒖𝒑 ✨
.
 Come join us for our first Orlando Informer Meetup!❤A few times a year, @orlandoinformer hosts a special ticketed event where you can experience the park in a totally different way! ✨🎉 [ad-pr]
.
✨ Experience the parks @univesalorlando after hours!! The parks close early to the general public (around 8 or 9 pm) but with your @orlandoinformer ticket, you can have access to the parks from 5pm to 1:30 am! (Usually these hours but can differ depending on the season and day)
.
✨ Unlimited food and non-alcoholic drinks!! We all know park food can be pricey and this is your chance to try all different types of food around the park with your ticket! 🌮🍦🍔 All-you-can eat starts after a certain hour (around 8 or 9 pm) They also give you a $15 voucher to spend whenever on food (we used it earlier in the evening and the next day for lunch) 😋
.
✨ Enjoy less crowds and shorter lines for rides because tickets are limited! I’ve never seen that amount of “ride now” signs 😂 Rides like Hagrid’s though still had a long wait (go around 9pm or before the rides close to have a shorter line)
.
✨ The best part imo was the unlimited food! We got to try every single ice cream flavour at Florean Fortescue’s and every drink at the Wizarding World, like all three kinds of butterbeer, fizzy orange drink and even fishy green ale! 🍻
.
✨Tickets are on sale now for the next @orlandoinformer event! Dates: February 3-4, 2023
.
Thank you so much @orlandoinformer for having us!! ❤️We had an amazing time 🙌🏻 Have you been to an @orlandoinformer event? 👇🏻✨
.
.
.
.
@universalorlando @harrypotterfilm #harrypotter #universalstudios #orlandoinformer #orlandoinformermeetup #universalorlando #wizardingworldofharrypotter

✨ 𝑰𝒔 𝒕𝒉𝒊𝒔 𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒍? ✨
.
“𝘛𝘦𝘭𝘭 𝘮𝘦 𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘭𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘨,” 𝘴𝘢𝘪𝘥 𝘏𝘢𝘳𝘳𝘺. “𝘐𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭? 𝘖𝘳 𝘩𝘢𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘣𝘦𝘦𝘯 𝘩𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘦𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘥𝘦 𝘮𝘺 𝘩𝘦𝘢𝘥?”

𝘋𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘭𝘦𝘥𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘣𝘦𝘢𝘮𝘦𝘥 𝘢𝘵 𝘩𝘪𝘮, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘷𝘰𝘪𝘤𝘦 𝘴𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘥 𝘭𝘰𝘶𝘥 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘰𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯 𝘏𝘢𝘳𝘳𝘺’𝘴 𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘴 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘰𝘶𝘨𝘩 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘣𝘳𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘵 𝘮𝘪𝘴𝘵 𝘸𝘢𝘴 𝘥𝘦𝘴𝘤𝘦𝘯𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘨𝘢𝘪𝘯, 𝘰𝘣𝘴𝘤𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘧𝘪𝘨𝘶𝘳𝘦.

“𝘖𝘧 𝘤𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘴𝘦 𝘪𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘩𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘦𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘥𝘦 𝘺𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘩𝘦𝘢𝘥, 𝘏𝘢𝘳𝘳𝘺, 𝘣𝘶𝘵 𝘸𝘩𝘺 𝘰𝘯 𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘩 𝘴𝘩𝘰𝘶𝘭𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘮𝘦𝘢𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘪𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘯𝘰𝘵 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭?”

Ready for the Yule Ball ❄️ The Durmstrang uniform is probably my favourite cosplay that I’ve done so far. It was such a fun challenge to do and given that I’m no seamstress, I’m pretty proud with how it turned out! 🤗 I’ve since made three Durmstrang uniforms, so at this point I should just open up for orders (jk)😂 If you’re thinking of making your own, here are some tips for any cosplay/bound:
.
✨ If you aren’t sewing from scratch, check out places like Aliexpress, Amazon, and SHEIN for cheap clothes/accessories that can be used on outfits. For a Durmstrang uniform, find a good base red jacket that has either military details or a mandarin collar
.
✨Be creative with your materials! My most genius and cost effective idea was making the Durmstrang walking stick out of a toilet paper roll, a stick that fell out when I was unrolling a new carpet, clay, and wood chips
.
✨ Don’t be afraid to experiment! This was my first time working with clay. Youtube honestly can teach you so much 🙌🏻
.
Hope to see more of you join the Durmstrang army! 💪🏻 I’ll be posting more details of my process in my stories/highlights! ❤️
.
.
.
. @harrypotteryuleballcelebration

.
Here’s a closer look at a few items from the @bradfordexchange Hogsmeade Christmas Village! I am obsessed with miniatures and especially miniature Christmas villages! Here are some of my thoughts on this village set:
.
✨I actually originally began collecting Bradford Exchange for my Christmas village but shortly after switched to focusing on Department56. 
✨Bradford Exchange Christmas village pieces are extremely cute. They are smaller than Department56 and they have glitter! They truly look Christmas-y❄️
✨They are battery operated (a plus if you don’t want wires but it can also be an extra step to have to switch every single one on💡)
✨Bradford Exchange works on a “subscription” basis where you get an “issue” (building) shipped to you at various intervals. Each building is $89.99 cad (😬💸)
✨ I ended up getting The Three Broomsticks, Honeydukes, and the Shrieking Shack
✨ In the end I chose to stop my subscription because I wanted to be in control of the items I received and when I would receive them. Though I really like the look of Bradford Exchange, I felt for a similar price, I would get a more detailed and bigger version with Department 56 and so chose to focus on that series instead
.
Let me know if you want another comparison video! I think I did it before in my stories which is saved in my highlights. Which set do you prefer? 👇🏻
.
.
.
#harrypotter #wizardingworldofharrypotter #hogwarts #hogsmeade  #department56 #christmasvillage #bradfordexchange #miniatures #miniaturevillage

Let’s take a walk down memory lane of our 2022 Harry Potter adventures! This year was full of incredible opportunities and magical memories. We are so grateful and wanted to say a big thank you to all of you who took the time to stop by our magical corner — without you we wouldn’t be able to share these memories! 🙏🏻❤️ Some highlights of this year include:

✨Meeting @minalima in NYC at their book launch party hosted by @harrypotterny 🥰
✨ The @hpforbiddenforrestexperience and the epic sleepover at Carla’s @giojammies with the Potter Pal crew 🙌🏻
✨Attending @fanexpocanada and meeting Sean Astin and Elijah Wood; seeing the 4 Hobbits reunited on their 10-year reunion tour! 💕
✨ Dancing at the Yule Ball in Montreal @harrypotteryuleballcelebration and completing our matching Durmstrang uniforms ✨💃🏻
✨ Our trip to France as a Beauxbatons student and visiting my dream bucketlist location Mont Saint Michel! 🦋
✨Attending the early screening of the 3rd @fantasticbeastsmovie hosted by @warnerbrosca ⚡
✨Pop-up Kowalski bakery in my hometown with @thegoodsweatsto 🥐
✨ Trip to Philly for the @harrypotter_exhibition 
✨ Marshmello concert at @universalorlando 🎶
✨ Staying out after hours in the park with @orlandoinformer and trying all the flavours at Florean Fortescue’s 🍨
✨ We definitely made use of our annual pass with 4 trips to @universalorlando this year and equally 4 trips to @harrypotterny 😆 
✨ Working on my Harry Potter room! Big reveal to come! 🙌🏻

✨ And of course meeting a bunch of you and hanging out with Potterheads like @cherrywallis @thepottercollector @theharrypottercollection @mugglestyle @giojammies @thecollectingwizard @myharrypottercorner @magic.her.way @whimsicallynicolette @thehusky.witch @lumos_stitches @mandrakesandmischief @the_magical_lou @polyjuice_and_pixiedust @adventureswithkayleen @beauxbatons_diaries @rawenclav and @harrypotterpops ...sorry if I missed anyone
.
Here’s to another year of magical adventures to come! 🍻 
.
.

💡Save this info for later ❤️:
.
✨ Celebrate the magic of the Yule Ball for the first time ever organized by @wizardingworld
.

.
✨ Tickets are still on sale through January 2023! 🎟️

Looks like I didn’t just do Harry Potter things this year 😆It’s been another whirlwind of a year and we hit some pretty big milestones that felt like they were only but a dream yesterday ❤️ Here were some of the most memorable:
.
✨ Bought our first house, our dream home! 
✨ Crossed off big bucket list destinations in Arizona/Utah and France
✨ Met @minalimadesign in NYC, collaborated with some dream brands, and made more unforgettable memories within the Harry Potter community
✨ Celebrated 1 year of marriage
✨ Survived 1st year of real practice
✨ Travelled to Arizona/Utah, Orlando, NYC, Virginia, New Orleans, and France
.
If you’re playing the game of life (which we all are), be all in. I love this quote by Mark Twain, “𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘴𝘦𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘨𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘩𝘦𝘢𝘥 𝘪𝘴 𝘨𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘦𝘥.” What are your goals for 2023? It’s never too late to get started and work towards your dreams! Wishing you all an amazing year to come in 2023! 🥂✨
.
.
.

✨ 𝑫𝑰𝒀: 𝑶𝒘𝒍 𝑷𝒐𝒔𝒕 ✨
.
I love the look of the owl post parcels in Harry Potter — there’s such a magical touch to it! This is a unique way to wrap presents for loved ones, or to just simply decorate for yourself! And it’s budget friendly! I was inspired by the DIY queen @tiff.dalton to decorate my Harry Potter shelves with owl post packages 🦉💌
.
✨ I bought a Hogwarts wax seal kit off Amazon for about $20
✨ Making the wax seal was a fun, mindful activity. I felt like I was living in the middle ages by melting the wax over a candle. It took some patience and practice (my later seals definitely looked way better than the first)😅
✨ I saved up Amazon boxes over the year until I had enough to decorate my wall space
✨ I got a huge roll of brown packaging paper and twill that will last me forever (it’s so much cheaper than Christmas wrapping! I’m going to wrap all my future christmas gifts like this) 🎄
✨ I bought special Owl Post stamps off Etsy. There are so many unique ones out there! If you want to be even more budget friendly, you can simply print off Owl Post designs off the internet and cut it out for the same look! ✌🏻 ( @thecollectingwizard has a great video on how he did his version! )
.
What do you think?
.
.
.
.
 #harrypotter #hogwarts #hogwartsismyhome #potterhead #gryffindor #slytherin #hufflepuff #ravenclaw #homedecor #hogwartslegacy #owlpost #harrypotterroom #harrypottercollection #bookshelvesofinstagram

.
What are your goals for 2023?Are you someone who makes goals for the year (and sticks to them?😆)👇🏻 Here are a few of mine:
✨ get back into physical health 🏃🏻‍♀️
✨ travel (UK is definitely on the list!) ✈️

I’m always a believer in making goals and working towards them, but also it’s important to not put pressure on yourself to complete them immediately. We are a constant work in progress! ❤️
.

Hands down the best ride ever 🙌🏻 (or should I say hands up?)
.
✨ Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure is the best ride at @universalorlando (close second is Velocicoaster)‼️
✨ To beat the lines, make sure you go first thing in the morning when the park opens and make a beeline for it!! 🏃🏻‍♀️
✨ Use early access or single rider as other strategies 
✨ You get the choice of either riding the motorbike or the sidecar! The motorbike is secure but definitely feels more intense! 🤯
✨ fyi if you are wearing robes they will make you sit in the sidecar 
✨ there are no loops — this coaster is all about speed!! 
✨ try riding it both at night and in the morning. It’s a different vibe each time 🌚🌞
✨ keep your eyes peeled for amazing magical creatures and more! 🦄
.
It is a must-try when you are in the parks, located on Islands of Adventure! 
.
.
.

Fancy a butterbeer? 🍻 What's your favourite way to have butterbeer: cold, frozen or hot? 🍺

✨ Step into the dingy but oddly comforting Hog’s Head Pub in Hogsmeade, the original meeting place of Dumbledore’s Army! ⚡️🐗
✨ This is one of the few places where you can get alcoholic beverages in the park (Like Dragon’s Scale and Hog’s Head Brew. I once had Firewhiskey in the past) 🥃
✨ You can order other specialty drinks like Pumpkin Fizz, spirits, and draft beers exclusively brewed for the Wizarding World. And of course classic Butterbeer!🍺
✨ Hit up the Three Broomsticks for a warm meal as they are right next to each other 🍗🧹
✨ My favourite detail is the mounted Hog’s Head! Make sure you catch it when it moves and listen closely for its snorting! 🐗
.
📍Universal Orlando

✨ 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐢 𝐕𝐥𝐨𝐠: 𝐀 𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐤𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐬 ✨
.
Gimme gimme… more magical adventures! An epic weekend well spent with fellow Potterheads! It still blows my mind to this day that I stumbled across this community and made friends that I truly connected with, simply because of my favourite book series.  I often get asked how to make friends in the Potterhead community and here are some of my thoughts ( @giojammies recently touched upon this and I agree with pretty much all her tips 😆)
.
How to make friends with Potterheads:
✨ It’s definitely easier to make connections if you start your own account so people can get to know you, but if you don’t have a huge collection to show or don’t like being in front of the camera, that’s okay! Be engaged with others in the community, comment on posts, and even start up conversations through DMs! We all love Harry Potter, so you already know you’re off to a great start!💕

✨Attend meet ups, conventions, book clubs, Wizarding World events — all of these shared experiences allow you to meet new people and make memories ⚡️

✨Make the first step! It definitely can be hard to be the first person to break the ice, but someone has got to! If you are feeling nervous about reaching out, just know that others are probably feeling the same way, but someone’s gotta do it!

✨ Be yourself, be genuine! It can be tough in this age of social media with the “pressure” to present yourself a certain way or with the fear of being judged online...but honestly just be you and do what you love! Genuinely enjoy what you are doing, and don’t let anyone take that away from you 💪🏻
.
Making friends as an adult is hard, but we are blessed to have these platforms to be able to connect. Social media can be a toxic world, if you let it be, but it’s so rewarding when you focus on the positive and use it as it was meant to be used- to make connections! ❤️
.
.
.
#potterhead #harrypotter #harrypotterfan #reels #reelsviral #reelsinstagram #wizardingworldofharrypotter #wizardingworld 
#universalorlando

The best ride at night! 🙌🏻 Should you ride Hagrid’s in the morning or night? Riding Hagrid’s at night is a totally different vibe!

What you need to know about Hagrid’s: 
[save for future!] 👇🏻
.
✨ Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure is the best ride at @universalorlando (close second is Velocicoaster)‼️
✨ To beat the lines, make sure you go first thing in the morning when the park opens and make a beeline for it!🏃🏻‍♀️ Or you can try right before closing but make sure you time it. 
✨ Use early access or single rider as other strategies 
✨ You get the choice of either riding the motorbike or the sidecar! The motorbike is secure but definitely feels more intense! 🤯
✨ fyi if you are wearing robes they will make you sit in the sidecar 
✨ there are no loops — this coaster is all about speed!! 
✨ try riding it both at night and in the morning. It’s a different vibe each time 🌚🌞 (I prefer night)
✨ keep your eyes peeled for amazing magical creatures and more! 🦄
.
It is a must-try when you are in the parks, located on Islands of Adventure!

.

Expelliarmus! 🪄 Do you wish you could cast these spells? We’ve compiled as many spells we could find from officially released gameplay of Hogwarts Legacy! @hogwartslegacy 🙌🏻

Hogwarts Legacy is an upcoming open world action RPG video game developed by Avalanche Software and published by Warner Bros. and Portkey Games. It is set in the Wizarding World Universe based on the Harry Potter books! It is scheduled for release for PC Windows, Playstation 4 and 5 (PS4, PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, and Nintendo Switch. 

We love gaming and the world of magic and we can’t wait for this video game! Growing up with games set in the Harry Potter universe, it is exciting to go back to Hogwarts. The scale of the game looks AMAZING! We plan to stream video game content on Twitch and Youtube once it is released on February 10, 2023 (pre-order release Feb 7)

Meeting Buckbeak was a magical moment at the Harry Potter: Forbidden Forest Experience ✨
.
✨ The @hpforbiddenforestexperience is being hosted in Leesburg, VA, Westchester,NY and Cheshire, UK. It’s still on until mid February 2023. We went back in October when it first opened. 
.
✨ Enjoy a casual stroll through the Forbidden Forest and keep your eyes open for the magical creatures you may encounter 👀
.
✨It is quite interactive with many photo stops along the way. Cast a Patronus to guide you through the dark! 🪄
.
✨My favourite was encountering Buckbeak. When you bow, make sure you keep eye contact!
.
✨ I loved hearing the sounds of the forest. They dressed the forest up with lights so the views never get boring. 🍂
.
✨There is a food stop where you buy pasties, butterbeer, and even wine and spirits! 🍻 It can be quite pricey for the food and drink so eat before if you want to go on a budget. 
.
✨The whole walk can probably be done in 2 hours. Dress warm because it’s an outdoor event! ❄️ You can take as long as you want. 

📍Forbidden Forest (Leesburg, VA)

Magical Locations in Paris (Fantastic Beasts):
✨ Quartier de Nicolas Flamel - visit the the house of Nicolas Flamel (51 rue de Montmorenc)
✨ Montmartre - entry to the Parisian Wizarding World (Place Cachée)
✨ Rue Giradon - the location of the statue that led to the Place Cachée and where Circus Arcanus set up
✨ Place Furstenberg - Entry to the Ministère des Affaires Magiques
✨ Pont Alexandre III - Bridge where Newt catches the Zouwou
✨ Cimetière du Père-Lachaise - burial of notable wizarding families in Paris

𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐇𝐨𝐠𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐬 𝐋𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐜𝐲

Wow! After our first 6 hours of gameplay, here are our first impressions of @hogwartslegacy :

✨ The attention to detail is AMAZING. They managed to combine seamlessly details from the books, movies and theme parks! The connected vision was breathtaking ❤️
✨ Gameplay was smooth and controls were easy to use. It’s great for all levels of play! You don’t need to be an expert gamer to enjoy this game! 🙌🏻
✨ The storyline was engaging and action packed from the get-go 💯
✨ Character creation could have been a bit more flushed out. Some of the presets didn’t quite match our true faces though we tried to get it as close as possible 🤔
✨ We are enjoying all the characters and NPCs so far. They are quite endearing and move the plot forward! 💕
✨ Overall rating: 10/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

✨𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐘𝐨𝐫𝐤: 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐋𝐢𝐦𝐚✨

You must visit the House of MinaLima when visiting @harrypotterny !😍 Here’s what you need to know: 
✨ @minalimadesign ( @limafilho and @miraphoramina ) are the graphic designers behind the look of the Harry Potter films and Wizarding World. They are known for their iconic props like the Hogwarts acceptance letter, the Howler, the Marauder’s Map and the Daily Prophet!
✨ They have three official locations: London, New York, and Osaka 
✨ You can buy limited edition prints (both signed and unsigned) featuring designs from the Harry Potter films
✨ All sorts of stationary are available, like the Hogwarts textbooks, note cards, letter writing kits
✨ Home decor featuring their designs ranging from pillow cases, wallpaper, and tea towels!
✨ You can even get a personalized Hogwarts Acceptance Letter Prop Replica that is handwritten by @miraphoramina herself! It’s just $3000 😆 But pretty cool!!
✨ The @minalimadesign store is located at the basement level of Harry Potter New York 
✨ Absorb all the details of the beautiful space, and make sure you snap a picture next to the fireplace holding a Hogwarts Letter! 💌

It’s hard to leave empty handed. Have you been to one of their locations? What did you pick up?

We visited the most magical bookstore in NYC, Albertine Books 📚✨ It’s a French-English bookstore in Manhattan, right next to Central Park. 
.
✨The stunning celestial ceiling is the highlight of the store- absolute room goals and it would be a dream to do this to my Harry Potter room 😍
✨The ceiling is a hand-painted mural of constellations, stars, and planets — modeled after the the ceiling of the music room at the Villa Stuck in Munich, Germany, crafted by Franz von Stuck (1863-1928)
✨ Fun Fact: The bookstore is actually owned by the government of France. Because it’s part of the French Embassy, it is technically a part of France! That’s why they say “The best bookstore in France is in NYC” 😆
✨ Trip itinerary ideas for Upper West Side: Visit the American Museum of Natural History, eat at Jacob’s Pickles for a delicious southern meal, snack on the famous cookies at Levain Bakery, walk through Central Park and visit Belvedere Castle, continue to cut through the park until you reach Albertine! ☕✨

This reel was inspired by @kellyprincewright and her amazing travel inspo. Thanks for the tip!
.
.

Guys I’ve been so excited to share this part of my Harry Potter room with you! My dream of having a fireplace has finally been realized! It completely transformed the room and made it so magical and cozy. ✨🥰
.
I’ve been going back and forth for months about putting in a fireplace but I could not get the idea out of my head until I tried. I was obsessed after seeing the set up of the @minalimadesign store at @harrypotterny ❤️ After scouring Facebook marketplace for months, the perfect one finally popped up!! I messaged the seller immediately, jumped in the car, and got an amazing deal. 
.
Let me tell you it was so hard finding one that fit all the criteria: the right price, size and weight, colour, details and style, electric..etc. What do you guys think?! 👇🏻✨
.
Details:
✨ Fireplace - $70 find on FB marketplace! 
✨ Wallpaper - @minalimadesign
✨ Hogwarts clock - @potterybarnteen (gifted)
✨ Wand hand Lamp - @potterybarnteen
✨ Gold owl piggy bank - @potterybarnteen
✨ Nimbus 2000: @cinereplicas.official
✨ I Solemnly Swear Pillow: @potterybarnteen (gifted)
✨ Gryffindor throw: @potterybarnteen (gifted)
.
Big thank you to all of you who kept encouraging me to follow my dream of putting a fireplace in the room! 🔥 I had many people tell me not to, but I trusted my gut! If there’s something you want to do, go for it!! 🙌🏻
.

Throwback to some mischief my brother and I got up to back in the day 🪄🤭🧪 What mischief have you been up to lately? 🤫
.
On another note, I definitely miss doing magical productions like this! ✨ During the pandemic we loved the challenge of creating magical edits in our own backyard. I’ve noticed that Pottergram goes through waves of different trends like magical edits, then merch, then parks, international travel, parks, now more merch. With our annual passes I’ve definitely been focusing more on parks/travel which led to the departure from these home edits, but I miss it dearly!!! It does take a lot more effort so hopefully I can carve out some time to do these local shoots again 🙏🏻😊 curious to know, what type of content do you like seeing most? 👇🏻
.
.
.

“𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘩𝘰𝘰𝘴𝘦𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘳𝘥, 𝘔𝘳. 𝘗𝘰𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳. 𝘐𝘵’𝘴 𝘯𝘰𝘵 𝘢𝘭𝘸𝘢𝘺𝘴 𝘤𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘳 𝘸𝘩𝘺. 𝘉𝘶𝘵 𝘐 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘬 𝘪𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘤𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘸𝘦 𝘤𝘢𝘯 𝘦𝘹𝘱𝘦𝘤𝘵 𝘨𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘨𝘴 𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘺𝘰𝘶.” - 𝘔𝘳. 𝘖𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘷𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳
.
Check out this amazing Book Nook of Ollivanders Wand Shop by LKWood! 🪄 I am obsessed with miniatures and the details on this one are fantastic and so magical! ✨ It’s perfect on my Harry Potter shelves!
.

.
✨ The details are incredible but very delicate. I love how the crooked shelves are stacked with wands all the way to the top! 🪄
✨ It’s battery operated and can light up! 💡Definitely sets the moody vibe 🌚
✨ @lkwood_official sells other amazing Harry Potter Book Nooks such as the Hogwarts Express, Diagon Alley, and the Cupboard under the Stairs 
✨ You can buy a DIY kit and paint it yourself or if you don’t have the time you can buy it pre-coloured 🎨
.
What do you think? 👇🏻⚡️
.
Also loved this sound from the movie / @wight_noize that matched perfectly!
.
.
.

Here’s a bit of a chaotic unboxing because I was so excited to open these final touches to my Harry Potter room! These beautiful tapestries are from @romantic_english_ 🪄😍 #gifted
.
✨Both these tapestries were featured in the Harry Potter films and totally transforms any room into Hogwarts! 
✨ I am obssesed with the The Hunt of the Unicorn tapestry series; it’s one of my all-time favourite prints! The Unicorn in Captivity is featured in the Half-Blood Prince as one enters the Room of Requirements
✨The Lady and The Unicorn series of Medieval tapestries are commonly recognized in the Gryffindor Common Room 
✨ I love the vibrant colours and intricate pattern and design of both these tapestries
✨ The material is very light weight, making it easy to hang
✨  When exploring the castle in Hogwarts Legacy, you can come across a ton of tapestries made in this same style! I plan to cover one of my doors for an added magical touch!
.
What do you think? 🪄🦄
.
.

✨ 𝐌𝐲 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐥𝐲 ✨
.
I am so thankful that my family is just as obsessed with Harry Potter as I am 😜 I still remember clearly when my parents came home with the first copy of the Philosopher’s Stone in 1997 and we read it together ❤️ After that, it was a stop at Costco first thing in the morning with each drop to pick up the latest copy.  We each took turns reading with a timer set for an hour and you would have to read the fastest so no one would spoil it 😆⏳
.
Our favourite adventures together have been trips to the Wizarding World! ✨ My parents are now in their 60s and have still not lost their love for the magic! Stay tuned because they will be embarking on their own Harry Potter adventures this spring and summer! I’m trying to get them to vlog so that they can share their adventures with you 😄 
.
QOTD: what’s been your experience with sharing your love with the Wizarding World with your family and friends? 👇🏻
.
.

Another iconic castle view, different from my usual Hogwarts! This was my attempt at being a Disney princess/influencer👸🏻 It felt unnatural 😆 but I did love prancing around in this dress! 😜💕 We visited Disney for the 50th Anniversary during the Christmas season! 
.
My husband and I only did Magic Kingdom while the rest of my family spent an extra week park hopping. My thoughts from this trip:
✨ Mickey’s Very Merry Christmas is worth it if you just want to experience Magic Kingdom, see the amazing fireworks, and eat unlimited cookies and hot chocolate (I make sure to stock up!!).The park closes late, lines are shorter and by the end the park was virtually empty!! 
✨ The rides at Disney in terms of grandness and detail are for sure incredible and on another level from Universal (aside from the Wizarding World obviously!)
✨However, personally I don’t think I would be able to go repeatedly to Magic Kingdom (maybe Epcot and Hollywood). Disney is for sure more catered to kids (though adults can enjoy too!) but I do prefer the more adult-rides and roller coasters of Universal 
✨I find the crowd at Universal chill whereas people at Disney can be cutthroat and aggressive 😆 We had a horrible experience where a woman kept purposely shoving her stroller into us during the fireworks in order to dominate the space (even though we were sitting there first!)
✨ I would like to check out Epcot and Hollywood Studios again since I haven’t been since 2019 and my husband has never experienced it 
✨ But the next time we do another huge Disney trip (park hopping) will prob be when we have kids 🍼
.
QOTD: Which park do you prefer? Pros and cons of each?
.
.

✨ 𝐍𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐨 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 ✨
.
Come with me to explore Super Nintendo World at Universal Studios Hollywood! 🙌🏻🎮 @unistudios It was pure madness but fun!!! ❤️💚🍄 Here are some of my tips and thoughts [save for later]:
.
✨The theme-ing and world building is AMAZING! It’s an explosion of colour and truly feels like you’re entering the Mushroom Kingdom! 🍄
🍄 You can see iconic views like Bowser’s Castle, Princess Peach’s Castle, Yoshi, gold coins, piranha plants, Goombas and Koopas, and of course meet Mario and Luigi! 👑
🍄 The Hollywood park is smaller than Japan and has only one main ride (Bowser’s) but they included some of Yoshi’s island theming in the queue for Mario Kart Bowser’s Challenge
 🍄 Go as early as possible! The crowds are crazy and it’s a small park. Early Access tickets will guarantee that you enter the land but it’s not necessary if you go early. We lined up at 7 am.
🍄 For peak times you still need a reservation to enter the world. Download the Universal app and join the virtual queue to grab a reservation 
🍄 MOST IMPORTANT: Get a reservation for Toadstool cafe immediately upon entering the park as they go quick (use QR code on the signs). A reservation at the restaurant also guarantees re-entry into the Nintendo park. 
🍄 Once you get toadstool, immediately line up for Mario Kart Bowser’s Challenge! The ride is worth it! (Stay tuned for full review)
🍄 Don’t worry if you can’t get a reservation in the day, from our experience they drop the need for reservations at night as the crowds lessen. 
.
Nintendo World opened at @unistudios in February 2023 and we couldn’t wait for it to open in 2025 in Orlando so we made a trip out to California! We’re so happy we got to experience it! We can’t wait for Orlando as it will be bigger and will likely feature a Donkey Kong roller coaster (and possibly Yoshi’s ride as in Japan). 
.
🍄 What do you think of Nintendo World?! We are also watching the Super Mario movie tonight and are hyppeeed!!!! 🙌🏻🍄
.
.
.
.
#nintendoworld #nintendo #supermario #mario #luigi #toadstoolcafe #universalstudios #marioandluigi #universalstudioshollywood

Here’s how I made my Lord of the Rings “Shirecuterie” Board for my Hobbit-inspired birthday party! 🧀🌱 [Save this post for inspo!! ❤️]
.
✨I came across this inspiration ( @thestarvingchefblog ) at 2.a.m. the night before and knew I had to make this “Shirecuterie” Board happen in time for my party!! 
✨ I made a trip to the Dollar Store and Homesense where I picked up materials and a cheese board
✨ I used a $1 cork trivet as the base of my Hobbit door, painted it and carved it for texture. I added a styrofoam ball as the door knob and a mini “No Admittance” sign for details.
✨ The beautiful Shire cupcakes are from @thegoodsweetsto (gifted) and really made the Shireboard come to life!! They are so incredibly cute and detailed, and most importantly tasted delicious too! 🧁
✨ And of course a hobbit needs their cheese and meat on the platter 🧀
✨ My @thenoblecollection Elven brooch was the perfect final touch, though it’s sitting in a bit of salami grease 😂
✨ I definitely recommend making your own Shirecuterie board for your next party! It was so fun to put together and a hit at the party! 🥳 Hobbits know how to party and this brought all the good vibes! 🙌🏻
.

✨I love being able to explore the sets and see more of the behind-the-scenes. A general ticket includes a guided tour of WB studio and then free time to roam the set of Friends, other exhibits, and finally Harry Potter! You can take your time… we were there for 6 hours 🤪
✨ We last went in 2021 however each tour you take will be slightly different depending on your guide and what sets are open! We saw so much more this time and got to walk around the set of Gilmore Girls, Abbott Elementary and All American!
✨Pro tip: Go early morning on a weekend; more sets will be open! 
✨ Out of the many HP locations I do believe that this has one of the best photo ops! Ranging from Privet Drive to Potions class! Swipe to see more 
✨ My fav feature is being able to get sorted as well as testing your potions skills in the dungeons! 🧪

✨𝐇𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐨 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐇𝐨𝐛𝐛𝐢𝐭𝐨𝐧✨

Hello from Hobbiton! Craig here! My parents and I have set off on an adventure in New Zealand and one of our first stops was the Hobbiton movie set! It was a dream come true! ❤️ Here are some of our thoughts [save for later 🌟]: 

✨ The Hobbiton set is beautiful, lush, and incredibly detail oriented! 😍
✨ Warning: It's a very fast 2-hour tour! 🥲 We could have easily spent 5 hours, especially if you want to soak it in or take lots of pictures. You have to stick to your group and you're not really allowed to wander too much on your own. It's probably best to do what @whimsicallynicolette did if you can, and book an additional (i.e. banquet) tour so you have more time to enjoy 🍗
✨ You can hang a bit back behind your guided tour to take photos, but you may miss some explanation from your guide about behind the scenes details, and your guide will keep you moving as there are a lot of tour groups going through the Shire 🌱
✨ Currently in 2023, part of the area is under construction (including Sam's home) because they will be adding to the tour in the future where you can visit the interior of a Hobbit hole. This is set to be completed by Dec 2023! 🍻
✨ For now, you can't actually truly go into any Hobbit holes as they are only exteriors.
✨ Overall, this is a must-see for any LOTR fan!! ❤️🫶🏻

Stay tuned for more of our hobbity adventures! We are next trekking to Mount Doom! We will be posting stories when we can!
.
.
.
.
Lord of the Rings
Hobbiton
Hobbit
Shire
.

social_posts.post_text:
@jessdreamsofmagic tagged me in a fun Q&A she dubbed as #whatatwizardingworld 😊 I love doing these, as it's a great way to get to know more of each other in this community! ⚡

Here’s my #whatatwizardingworld ⬇️

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐚𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝?
Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure hands down!! (or hands up? 🙌🏻) It's too bad that it always breaks down or the lines are so long, but I always make an effort to do it at least once on a trip to @universalorlando

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐬𝐧𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐚𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝?
I could always go for the fresh baked apple crumble pie at the Three Broomsticks 🤤

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐝𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐚𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝?
I am now a convert to hot butterbeer! 🍺 but a close second is Otter’s Fizzy Orange Juice (even though my husband just says it's expensive Fanta)

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐤? 𝐡𝐨𝐠𝐬𝐦𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞 𝐨𝐫 𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐠𝐨𝐧 𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐲?
Hogsmeade. It's not truly the Wizarding World without a view of Hogwarts Castle 🥹 And I love the magical quaint feeling of Hogsmeade village and looking at the shops at night. Plus Hagrid's is there. 

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐨𝐟 𝐛𝐮𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐛𝐞𝐞𝐫?
Hot!🍻🔥

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐤 𝐝𝐨 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐢𝐧? 𝐡𝐨𝐠𝐬𝐦𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞 𝐨𝐫 𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐠𝐨𝐧 𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐲?
Usually Hogsmeade because IOA is opened first for early access and it's good to make a beeline for Hagrid's ride 🏃🏻‍♀️

✶ 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐞?
Flight of the Hippogriff because it's more tame. I do get motion sick now on Forbidden Forest, but now I just walk through the Castle! 🥰

Thank you @jessdreamsofmagic for inviting me to answer! If you want to answer these fun questions, copy and paste this into your next IG post and tell us your favourite things about the Wizarding World! ✨

Wes Anderson presents...A Beauxbatons Girl in Paris 🦋

I was inspired by @magicbymikaila to hop on this Wes Anderson trend! I love Wes Anderson movies, his cinematography and how whimsical his art is! I’m not currently in the parks so had to use whatever old footage I had but I thought the Beauxbatons ones kind of matched so...here this is for fun! 🦋🤪 Hope you enjoy this magical production 🦋🦋😆 I’m trying to work on an actual Wizarding World one but we will see how it turns out. 
.

#wesanderson #wesandersonstyle #wizardingworld #harrypotter #beauxbatons #paris #wizardingworldofharrypotter #potterhead #beauxbatonsaesthetic

✨𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐥 𝐇𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐲𝐰𝐨𝐨𝐝✨

This was the first time I went to @universalstudios in Hollywood! We had a great time! Here are some of my thoughts:
✨The Wizarding World at @universalstudios is definitely smaller than @universalorlando but it still has its own charm of its own! 🥰
✨ Only Hogsmeade is available, and many of the shops are much smaller, but at the same time, I found some of the storefronts to be even more photogenic, and the California light and weather is unbeatable 👌🏻
✨The Castle is just as grand, but unfortunately there’s no clear viewing point to take pics (like the bridge in Orlando). However, they do have the lovely Ford Anglia that makes for great photo ops! Listen closely and you can even hear it rumbling and beeping! 🚙
✨ At present, I would say a trip to Universal Hollywood is definitely worth it if you combine it with Nintendo World! Nintendo World in Orlando is not projected to open until 2025
✨ There are fun rides that you can’t get in Orlando: The World-Famous Studio Tour of the backlot is incredible and you can drive by sets and see how movies are made! My favourite ride which I’m so glad we did last minute was the Jurassic World ride; the animatronics were amazing and so realistic, especially at night!
✨ The crowd level in California is definitely less, especially if you are going off season 🙌🏻
✨ Pro tip: if you don’t want expensive park food, drive out to Porto’s (less than 10 min away) and have a delicious lunch!! I could eat Porto’s everyday if I’m there. (Parking has re-entry)
.
.
.

✨𝐎𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐖𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞✨
.
“𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘩𝘰𝘰𝘴𝘦𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘳𝘥...”
.
After YEARS of waiting, I finally got chosen at Ollivanders for the wand experience and got my wand!!!! 😭🥰 Words cannot describe how iconic this experience was! 🥹 It was my birthday, so best birthday present ever!! I had almost given up hope—every single time I’ve tried in the past I was passed over for little kids, randoms, and even my brother (he got chosen three times! Even when standing far in the back!) But I was not going to give up and I knew the odds were in my favour this time, thanks to the best hype team I could have asked for @mugglestyle @myharrypottercorner and @marveloussabrina 🥹❤️💪🏻 We employed every tactic in the book in order to be chosen such as:

✨ Wear birthday badge
✨ Shine light on birthday badge
✨ Sing loudly happy birthday when entering the room in front of Ollivander
✨ If you don’t succeed, try repeatedly and line up again until you succeed 

Thanks guys for your support and encouraging me! These amazing friends were willing to do it as many times as it took until I succeeded (my husband was relieved that I was chosen after the second time so he didn’t have to be tortured more) 😂 There is definitely a hierarchy in who gets chosen. The first time I was passed over for someone with a VIP badge (It trumps the birthday badge ha!) But in all seriousness, definitely wear a birthday badge if it’s your birthday because you get 10x better treatment from workers and even sometimes perks (we got free express ride tickets)! And if it’s not your birthday, don’t give up, the staff take notice if you do it repeatedly over and over again 😂
.
🪄 My wand: Walnut & Dragon Heartstring 
.
QOTD: What are the elements of your wand? 🪄
.

The most beautiful bookset I own 🥹 I want to cry when I look at this because not only is it a stunning set by @litjoycrate , but it’s one of my favourite book series ever: The Cruel Prince (The Folk of the Air Series) by @blackholly 🖤 I finally got around to capturing only a fraction of this beauty. If you love fae romance, enemies to lovers tropes, and beautiful whimsical writing, then this is a must read!
.
✨ This set by @litjoycrate contains all 3 books in The Folk of the Air series: The Cruel Prince, The Wicked King, and The Queen of Nothing, plus the novella, How the King of Elfhame Learned To Hate Stories 
✨ The Cruel Prince is Hand Signed ❤️
✨ The covers speak for themselves. I can’t get over how beautiful they are with the liberal gold foiling (and gilded gold page edges!)
✨ I love how this version is illustrated and has handwritten annotations by Holly Black throughout the books!
✨ This set was absolutely worth every single penny. I cannot wait for more beautiful special editions like this to come out (ahem, waiting for ACOTAR!)
✨ I just finished reading Holly Black’s newest book, The Stolen Heir, and loved being brought back into the world of Elfhame! Please continue bringing your fae magic to us Holly! 🫶🏻
.
QOTD: Do you collect booksets? What are your fav series? 📚
.
.

I don’t nearly show my shelves in my Harry Potter room enough, so here is a little Shelfie Sunday appreciation ❤️ I spent the weekend decluttering my space in order to highlight my main pieces. My shelves were a mess for the longest time but now that I’ve set up a desk and it will become a true office, I need a clean space for a clear mindset! After moving things around I realized I still have a lot of space for a few more wishlist items 🤭 (thanks to everyone who gave feedback on items they own and recommend!) This will never be a minimalist space but I’m trying to be more purposeful in what items I choose to place on my shelves 🪄❤️

✨ 𝐍𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐨 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 𝐓𝐨𝐚𝐝𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐥 𝐂𝐚𝐟𝐞 ✨
.
Come along to try the Super Nintendo World Toadstool Cafe @unistudios!! 💚🍄 Here are some of my tips [save for later]:
.
🍄 Make a reservation as early as possible, once you get into the park! Reservations go quickly, but if you get one, it also guarantees you re-entry into Nintendo World 
🍄 We tried the Mario and Luigi burgers which come with a cute hat and moustache 🍔 Both were delicious. The Luigi burger (chicken pesto) was my favourite out of all the things we tried! Make sure you ask for extra creamy pesto dip 😋
 🍄 Bowser’s Fireball Meatball Challenge looked good but was on the dry side. It was very expensive and I wouldn’t recommend 
🍄 The Fire Flower Spaghetti Meatballs on the other hand had the same kick and flavour but was good and flavourful 🍝
🍄 My friends tried the mushroom soup and tomato soup that come in a cute toadstool bowl. Presentation was 10/10 but portion was tiny and they take away the bowl right away 😂 
🍄 Desserts were fantastic. The Princess Peach cupcake was stuffed with a raspberry jam and the buttercream was delicious! It was one of the best cupcakes I’ve had in my life 🧁 The question mark box tiramisu was super cute and also yummy (but didn’t have much of an alcohol flavour)
.
Overall, the theme-ing of this restaurant is amazing! It feels like you’re feasting in the Mushroom Kingdom! 🍄 The presentation of the food was 10/10 and overall most of the meals were delicious and portion size was good. Definitely recommend you give it a try! 🙌🏻
.
.
.
.
#nintendoworld #nintendo #supermario #mario #luigi #toadstoolcafe #universalstudios #marioandluigi #universalstudioshollywood

Come with me to see a first look of the @harrypotter_exhibition in NYC❤️ #harrypotterexhibition #mediainvite 
.
✨  Learn more about the behind-the-scenes making of the Harry Potter films and the Wizarding World, with an up close look at the detailed props and amazing costumes of all your favourite characters! ✨❤️
✨ Try all the interactive experiences from potion making to fighting a boggart. My favourite was playing quidditch! 🧪🧹
✨ There are a ton of fun photo ops on iconic sets, like Umbridge’s office, the cupboard under the stairs, and a look inside Hagrid’s Hut! 😻
✨ They put so many little details into this exhibition! Make sure you don’t miss it. My favourite was when you could have your name appear on the Marauder’s Map! 👣
✨ The merch at this Exhibition was 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻with a lot of items being exclusive to the store!
📍Harry Potter: The Exhibition, Herald Square, NYC
🗓️ May 19, 2023 - October 15, 2023
.
Thank you @harrypotter_exhibition for inviting me to preview this experience! It was so much fun ❤️ Would you go to the Exhibition? ✨⚡️

Looking for a magical experience in NYC?🗽Check out the Wizard Afternoon Tea at the Cauldron! @thecauldronpub🪄☕️✨[hosted]

The Wizard Afternoon Tea includes:
✨Magic wand and equipment rental 
✨2 interactive teas brewed by magic wand ✨Curated selection of “sand-witches”, scone and desserts
✨A 1hr 45min interactive experience

⚡️We shared sandwiches amongst our group so I got to try the smoked salmon, cucumber and cream cheese and the honey butter avocado 🥪
⚡️The scone with potted cream was my absolute favourite! 😋
⚡️I was not the greatest at brewing my tea but a generous spoonful of sugar and honey did the trick 😆 🫖
⚡️ @thecauldronpub is located in the historic cobblestoned Stone Street in NYC. The interior is so whimsical and magical! 🖤
⚡️ They also offer an immersive Potion Making cocktail class where you can brew your own drinks! 🧪🍸

Thank you @thecauldronpub for hosting us! ❤️ I had a magical time with these ladies over tea: @tiff.dalton @magic.her.way @misswizardingworld @magicallyhome @giojammies @polyjuice_and_pixiedust @lumos_stitches

✨𝐉𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐜 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝: 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐄𝐱𝐡𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧✨

Come with me to explore Jurassic World: The Exhibition in Toronto, Canada! 🦖This was honestly one of the most fun experiences we’ve had and we were absolutely blown away by the scale and realism of these dinosaurs! 🦕🤯❤️ @jurassicworldexhibition #mediainvite

✨ Get ready for an incredibly immersive experience that brings Jurassic World to life! It really does feel like you’re stepping into Jurassic World, the dinosaur theme park on Isla Nublar! 
✨ Get up close and personal with life-size dinosaurs, incuding some iconic ones that you may recognize like the raptors (Blue!), Indominus Rex, and even T-Rex! 🦖
✨ Step into The Creation Lab and see how the dinos are made!
✨ The animatronics were so realistic and the live-action acting was fun! 😆
✨ The Experience took about 45 minutes. You get separated into smaller groups. Even though it was less than an hour, we did not feel rushed at all. We felt there was plenty of time to admire the dinosaurs and take pics. 
✨ This is a family-friendy event, perfect for kids of all ages, and adults!

📅 Date: from April 21, 2023 - October 1, 2023
⏳ Duration: 45 minutes
📍 Location: Mississauga (near Toronto), 199 Rathburn Rd W, Canada
(This is a travelling exhibition and is currently also in Atlanta, USA and Köln, Germany)

I loved this Experience so much and I really hope they create more Jurassic World set ups like this (i.e. it would be perfect at Universal)! I can see why people are obsessed with these majestic creatures. Thank you @jurassicworldexhibition and @fever_global for hosting us!
.
.
.
#jurassicworld #jurassicpark #dinosaur #dinosaurs #jurassicworldexhibition #blogto #yyz #torontoblogger

Revelio! 🪄 Check out this phenomenal replica of the Hogwarts Legacy magical Portkey created by @invent3dro ✨😍 In the game, a mysterious Portkey forged out of goblin metal appears, where only you can see the glow and the ancient magic within. It allows you and Professor Fig to travel to a remote cliffside in the Scottish Highlands. You must explore the ruins for something the Portkey was meant to lead you to...[gifted]
 
✨This Portkey replica was created by @invent3dro and is 3D printed from biodegradable PLA plastic, laser cut, and handpainted 👏🏻
✨The piece is incredibly detailed and opens up to reveal a key inside 🗝️
✨ It’s sturdy and fantastic quality. This is screen accurate and feels like it came right out of the game 🎮
✨You have the option to add the “light” to the Portkey and make it glow ✨
✨ This is a must for collectors and cosplayers alike! @hogwartslegacy has opened up a whole new part of the Wizarding World to explore and bring to life! 🪄

Thank you so much @invent3dro for sending me this magical portkey! I can’t wait to bring it with me as an essential prop to my Hogwarts Legacy cosplays! 🥰

Midnight at Skogafoss 🇮🇸 This is my 4th time travelling to  Iceland and it never gets old. There’s so much to explore and it’s truly a magical country with a wild beauty that needs to be protected at all costs! ✨❤️ This time we came during the midnight sun, where the sun barely sets from mid-May to mid-July. This means that we can enjoy long days, hikes past midnight, no crowds and beautiful light. Would you travel during the midnight sun? ✨

This Hogwarts Envelope Clutch has become one of my all-time favourite bags! When I unboxed it a month ago I got a ton of questions about it! I purchased mine from @curiosasociety but the brand is @bioworld ❤️

social_posts.post_text:
It's time for #PotterificJuly !⚡Day 1 prompt is "I'm a Potterhead" or should I say, "We are Potterheads!"

I never thought as an adult, I would be able to live out my childhood dreams, and most of all, form real lasting friendships in adulthood! 🥰 I always recall this quote from Trainspotting (one of my fav movies) of making choices in adulthood and the constant grind: “Choose Life. Choose a job. Choose a career. Choose a family. Choose a f*cking big television. Choose washing machines, cars, compact disc players, and electrical tin openers." While I still want all those things, I also want whimsy, adventure, and magic in my life! ✨

Through Pottergram, I've been able to find an outlet to express myself and experience the freedom of enjoying a passion with no shame! This magical community has brought so much joy, magic, and new experiences to our lives. 🙏🏻 I can't believe it's been 3 years since I started this account featuring myself and my brother on our wizarding adventures. It was initially the perfect escape from the muggle world during the pandemic, a way to connect with others and stave off the isolation that so many of us felt. But lo and behold, those connections we began to form 3 years ago are still going strong! ❤️ That's the true magic of Harry Potter and its core message: learning the power of love and friendships. As Hermione Granger once said, "Books! And cleverness! There are more important things - friendship and bravery" 🪄❤️

We are so thankful for all of you who have come along our magical journey! Stay magical! ✨

Also, thanks @saraallie for hosting #potterificjuly each year! I'm already a day behind but thought I'd join in on the fun with these prompts! Check out the photo challenge for inspo!

.
.
.

✨ 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐓𝐫𝐲-𝐎𝐧 𝐇𝐚𝐮𝐥 ✨

Gimme all the dark academia Harry Potter looks 😍 These lovely pieces are from the brand Kyokou which I picked up from @devilinspiredofficial 🪄 I have a serious love-hate relationship with Devil Inspired so get ready for this review:

✨ I LOVE the Kyokou Harry Potter collection. They are so stylish, with beautiful details, and the quality is honestly amazing. The perfect dark academia look 🖤
‼️🚨Devil Inspired/Kyokou are Asian-fit, which means they fit SMALL!! You will likely need to size up 1-2 sizes!
✨For reference I usually wear a xs-s. I bought M in most items but there were still misses. The red skirt is a M and won’t close. I need a L. Many of the shirts are tight in the chest area and JUST fit. I got the long sleeve dress shirt in a S based on size chart but would have preferred a M. 
✨ Their return policy sucks— in that it’s basically non existent. You have only 3 days to return once receiving the package. Also they only accept items back if there is a defect, not if it doesn’t fit or if you change your mind 
‼️Stock is a HUGE issue. Two times I’ve placed orders for items showing as in stock only for them to say it’s not available. You have to REQUEST the refund… and then CHASE them down for your money. It’s actually ridiculous and unacceptable. 
✨Shipping is hit or miss. Read carefully because sometimes they need 2 weeks to even prep the items before shipping. It’s usually taken 1 month total but one time it took over 2 months!!
✨EVERY piece of accessory/embellishment you see, you will need to buy separately. Do not assume that a scarf or bow tie or a little decorative piece comes with the piece of clothing. 

TLDR: Kyokou pieces are beautiful and amazing but you are buying at A RISK from Devil Inspired. Be prepared for all of the above. I clearly have taken that risk a few times and will likely do so again even though it’s hella annoying 😂

Anywho— what do you think of the pieces? 😂🥰
.
.
.

✨ 𝐌𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐨𝐟 𝐦𝐲 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐑𝐨𝐨𝐦✨

The making of my Harry Potter room! 🪄 It’s been officially a year since I began transforming this boring white room into the Room of Requirement of my dreams! ✨My goal was to make it a functional space with a dark academia aesthetic and a mix of a cabinet curiosity, Harry Potter, and my other beloved fandoms on display🖤

✨ Favourite Corner: The cozy fireplace with the Black Family Tree (best FB marketplace find)
✨ Most challenging: The Minalima Black Family Tree wallpaper which took 12h to put up. Worth it. 
✨ It’s all in the details: From the owl lights to simply changing the wall plates to antique gold, these little details made a big difference in tying it all together!
✨ Most useful: My writing desk on sale from CB2. It took ages to find the perfect desk that fit the aesthetic of the room and was actually big enough. Now I actually work and spend most of my time in my Harry Potter room!
✨Things I learned: Youtube is your friend ; patience is key (the furniture/item you’re looking for will eventually pop up and that sale will eventually happen); and pad the floor when hanging things 🥲
✨ Future goals: Paint the ceiling if I can convince my husband

QOTD: What do you guys think?👀

I am so in love with this room! It is truly the highlight of my house 🥰 Thank you for all your support on this account and all the advice/encouragement you guys have given me through this process! And the BIGGEST thank you has to go to my DAD, mom, HUBBY, Craig and my friend Matt who helped to put the hardest parts of this room together (from transporting the Billy Bookshelves up and down the stairs, to putting them together and drilling to the wall, helping me put up difficult items when I was too scared to do it myself, and David suffering with me through the wallpaper ordeal). It really did take a village to make this all come together and words cannot express how grateful I am!! 🙏🏻
.
.
@harrypotterfilm @wizardingworld @potterybarnteen #harrypotterroom #harrypotter #wizardingworld #gryffindor #slytherin #hogwarts #lovemypbteen #universalorlando #reelsviral

✨𝐇𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐞𝐞 𝐁𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐡𝐝𝐚𝐞 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲✨

In honour of the Boy Who Lived’s birthday, I decided to put my baking skills to the test and make Hagrid’s famous birthdae cake 🎂 Full disclosure, I am not a baker and I also didn’t really make a cake 😂 I have almost next to no baking tools, so used whatever I had at my disposal and made a brownie “cake” instead. This “recipe” is for all you lazy/busy people who don’t have time to bake, like me!

✨I used the Ghirardelli brownie mix (from Costco) cos it is the BOMB and tastes professional and amazing. It also only requires oil, water, and one egg lol
✨I mixed the batter, and it requires nothing fancy aside from a spoon
✨For the pink icing, I contemplated making buttercream, but I got no time for that. So water + icing sugar + a few drops of red food dye= done! 
✨ I used the ziplock bag trick to do the green icing writing
✨ When I did this two years ago, I actually did an even faster method where I bought a plain chocolate cake from Costco and all I had to do was the buttercream icing decor! 🙌🏻

Overall, I think it turned out pretty good! Except, because I took a short cut and didn’t actually use buttercream, it ended up being tricker to spread and melted more easily and I almost destroyed the whole thing in the end. 😂 But alas, the beauty of Hagrid’s cake is that it doesn’t need to be perfect because it should look like it was sat on! Enjoy 🍰
.
.
.

Come with me to explore the biggest Funko store in the world!!! We stopped by Funko Hollywood, right on Hollywood Blvd and the Walk of Fame 🙌🏻 @originalfunko 

✨This massive space (40,000 sq ft) is home to larger-than-life giant Funkos and amazing photo ops! 
✨ All your favourite fandoms can be found, from Disney and Marvel to anime and TV shows. Some our favs included Frozen, Stranger Things, Jurassic Park, Game of Thrones, and of course, the huge Harry Potter section!! ⚡️
✨ Pick up Funko shop exclusives and unique merch 
✨ A super cool feature was a chance to design your very own Funko! (I made mine look like circa 2010-2020 me)
✨ The best thing is that it is FREE entry!!

Full disclosure, I actually don’t own a single Funko and I also left without one 😂🤪 But even if you’re not a Funko collector, this store was amazing and fun to explore!🙌🏻

Check out this vintage Harry Potter pop up book with delightful illustrations by Mary GrandPré! 🥹❤️ It features scenes from the first four Harry Potter books, including Harry and Ron’s arrival at Hogwarts in the flying car, a Quidditch march, Harry’s encounter with a Dementor, rescuing Sirius Black and finally Harry’s first task of collecting the Golden Egg during the Triwizard Tournament ⚡️

Mary GrandPré is one of my favourite HP illustrators and I am obsessed with the nostalgia and craft of Pop Up books, so after I saw this featured on @ohgreenroyal ‘s page I had to hunt it down!! It ended up getting delivered to the wrong address but eventually made its way back to me 😁❤️

#harrypotter #harrypottercollection #harrypotterbooks #wizardingworld #hogwarts #hogwartsismyhome

A closer look at my Harry Potter room ⚡️

I started collecting Harry Potter items since I was a kid—it was mainly books, different versions of the HP series or “the making of” books, some tiny collectibles here and there, and artwork/prints. Back in the day there wasn’t actually much Harry Potter merch that was good (though now some of those vintage pieces look really good! 😂) and as a kid I also had no money 😆 Now as an adult I can live out my childhood dream. My collection began to expand just before the start of the pandemic and eventually I realized it should be properly displayed rather than scattered around and in boxes. For years I wanted a magical study but had to wait until we had a proper space to make it come to life. And…tada! Welcome to my Harry Potter room! 🥰

QOTD: If you collect, when did you start collecting and do you remember what your first item was? (Other than the books I think mine was a tiny Hedwig figurine) 

I tried to film a closer look at some of the shelves for you guys. It was inspired by my friend who also filmed a video when he came over to visit. He thought I was the biggest HP fan but he’s seen nothing yet from this community 🤪 Sorry it’s a bit grainy since I filmed at night 🌑

.
.
@harrypotterfilm @wizardingworld @potterybarnteen #harrypotterroom #harrypotter #wizardingworld #gryffindor #slytherin #hogwarts #lovemypbteen #universalorlando #reelsviral

Revelio! 🪄 Check out this phenomenal replica of the Hogwarts Legacy magical Portkey created by @invent3dro ✨😍 In the game, a mysterious Portkey forged out of goblin metal appears, where only you can see the glow and the ancient magic within. It allows you and Professor Fig to travel to a remote cliffside in the Scottish Highlands. You must explore the ruins for something the Portkey was meant to lead you to...[gifted] Swipe to see more! 👉🏻
 
✨This Portkey replica was created by @invent3dro and is 3D printed from biodegradable PLA plastic, laser cut, and handpainted 👏🏻
✨The piece is incredibly detailed and opens up to reveal a key inside 🗝️
✨ It’s sturdy and fantastic quality. This is screen accurate and feels like it came right out of the game 🎮
✨You have the option to add the “light” to the Portkey and make it glow ✨
✨ This is a must for collectors and cosplayers alike! @hogwartslegacy has opened up a whole new part of the Wizarding World to explore and bring to life! 🪄

We will be cosplaying in our Hogwarts Legacy gear at @fanexpocanada this weekend! 🙌🏻 Hope to see you there if you’re going!!

🎃𝐇𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐇𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐫 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟑🎃

This year's Halloween Horror Night experience was one for the books!! 🙌🏻It was just CRAZY. Um..we saw @warwickadavis (aka Professor Flitwick /Griphook) with the Death Eaters in Diagon Alley!! Need I say more?? ❤️💀 I ended up doing 2 nights of HHN and each night was a blast, thanks to good company and good vibes! 🥰 @horrornightsorl 

Day 1:
✨Opening night was utter chaos with HHN starting out in hurricane rains and being stranded at the entrance for hours in our ponchos 😆 
✨ But an empty Diagon Alley in the rain was a sight to behold!!! WORTH IT
✨ I got to see the Death Eaters for the first time!! We all had our Dark Marks on display
✨ We did only one haunted house because the lines were insanity. Waited 2h for The Last of Us 😂 Luckily we had each other to pass the time. Can't go wrong with good company and good conversation!

Day 2: 
✨ Impromptu decision with @magic.her.way to go back for a second night to maximize our HHN experience and no regrets! It ended up being the craziest night!!
✨ We started off by suffering at 330pm in the Stay and Scream--which was the best decision in order to access all the houses first. We knocked out 4 houses before 7 pm with a regular pass
✨ Bumped into @marketstreetgallery who then shared Express passes after 11 with us (thank you!!)! What a difference a 10min wait does compared to 2h 😂 We did 9/10 houses so in the end I saw all 10 houses this year! 🙌🏻
✨ Spotted @warwickadavis with the Death Eaters in Diagon Alley??? We literally stumbled across him. I ran to take pics with the Death Eaters not knowing he was there and was stopped by security 😂 Then we literally crawled on all fours to get to the front to see him up close
✨ My request to take a pic with a Death Eater turned into an epic battle against 5 Death Eaters!! Dream come true!!
✨ Fav houses: Oddfellow, Blood Moon, The Darkest Deal

Anyways, embrace the chaotic and crazy -- you never know what can happen. HHN needs to be an annual experience for sure!! 🙌🏻🎃

#halloweenhorrornights #hhn #hhn32 #universalorlando #wizardingworld #harrypotter #deatheater #warwickdavis

An empty Diagon Alley in the rain is a sight to behold 😍

Halloween Horror Night is the best way to experience an empty Diagon Alley. Lots of people avoid doing HHN because they are scared of the haunted houses, but imo a HHN ticket is still worth it! Here’s why 👇🏻 @horrornightsorl 

Perks of buying a HHN ticket even if you’re a scaredy-cat:

✨ See Diagon Alley from a spooky perspective (fog machines, lights) and have it all to yourself! It’s so empty and open until park closes at 2 a.m 🥰👻
✨ Watch the Death Eaters come out to play every 30 min 
✨ Ride Gringotts and eat food at the Leaky Cauldron while enjoying shorter wait times 🍻
✨ You can still get a taste of HHN by going through the scare zones and trying specialty food items! 🍔
✨ You can watch the show Nightmare Fuel which is INCREDIBLE and makes the ticket worth it just for that (think sexy cirque du soleil with fire) 🔥
✨ If you dare, you can try a haunted house or two! 😈

So even if you’re a scaredy cat it’s worth looking into HHN! HHN is now my favourite experience @universalorlando and I hope to make it an annual tradition ♥️🎃

PS. We shot this on opening night of HHN and it was pouring rain. We were all huddled under a shelter but when we saw @giojammies dancing in the rain in an EMPTY Diagon Alley, we RAN to experience the same 😂 it was beautiful, freeing, and so worth it getting wet 🫶🏻

𝘚𝘬𝘶𝘭𝘬𝘪𝘯’ 𝘢𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘥 𝘒𝘯𝘰𝘤𝘬𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘯 𝘈𝘭𝘭𝘦𝘺, 𝘐 𝘥𝘶𝘯𝘯𝘰 — 𝘥𝘰𝘥𝘨𝘺 𝘱𝘭𝘢𝘤𝘦, 𝘏𝘢𝘳𝘳𝘺 — 𝘥𝘰𝘯’ 𝘸𝘢𝘯𝘵 𝘯𝘰 𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘴𝘦𝘦 𝘺𝘦𝘩 𝘥𝘰𝘸𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘦 —

Spooky season is coming so let's take a walk through Knockturn Alley…with a Death Eater as our guide 🐍 There is so much to see in this dark alley:

✨ Stop at Borgin and Burkes for unusual and ancient magical artefacts devoted to the Dark Arts
✨ While there, check out the Hand of Glory and the Cursed Necklace — but don't get too close…or touch
✨ At the back of the store you'll find a Vanishing Cabinet. You can hear the faint sounds of a bird on occasion
✨ Listen to the Shrunken Heads sing
✨ My favourite detail are the moving drawings in a nearby artist studio
✨ Hidden Spells available: Chimney Sweep Elf sign, Noggin and Bonce, Dystal Phaelanges, Trackleshanks Locksmith, and Tallow and Hemp Toxic Tapers
✨ You may have a Death Eater sighting during @horrornightsorl nights 💀
✨ Hide out in Knockturn Alley if the weather is too hot 🥵

QOTD: What reason would you have to be skulking around Knockturn Alley?

✨𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐢𝐥𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: 𝐆𝐨𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐝✨

Did you know you can visit Hogsmeade Station in real life?! 🚂

Goathland Station has become a celebrity station as it was used in the first Harry Potter film and featured  the Hogwarts Express arriving in Hogsmeade with students starting the school year. 

✨ Goathland Station opened originally in 1865 as part of the North East Railway. It now is part of the North York Moors Railway

✨ The Best Part: Watch a historic restored steam train run by! Trains run daily 🚂

✨ Some Harry Potter fans choose to even ride the train through the lovely Yorkshire countryside 

✨You can visit the charming village of Goathland and hike around North York Moors National Park

✨ Goathland is best to add to your itinerary between York and Durham Cathedral

📍Goathland Station, UK

#harrypotter #harrypotterfilm #wizardingworld #hogwartsexpress #goathland #goathlandstation #hogsmeade #hogwarts #hogwartsismyhome #steamtrain

#harrypotter #hogwarts #triwizardtournament #hogwartsismyhome #wizardingworld #harrypotterfilm

✨𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐢𝐥𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: 𝐆𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐚𝐧 𝐕𝐢𝐚𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭✨

Want to see the Hogwarts Express in real life?! The iconic scene of the Hogwarts Express travelling through the Scottish Highlands was actually filmed here at the Glenfinnan Viaduct 🚂

✨Glenfinnan Viaduct attracts thousands of visitors from around the world to experience the stunning scenery but also mainly to see a real life Hogwarts Express pass by! 

✨ West Coast Railways, operators of ‘The Jacobite’, provided the steam engine and carriages for the ‘Hogwarts Express’ in the films! @westcoastrailways 

✨ The world famous Jacobite steam train follows the journey of the Hogwarts Express and you can watch it pass by from afar over the Viaduct 

✨ The train passes by four times a day: 1045h, 1320h, 1510h, and 1805h

✨ There is a short hike to the top of the hill to see the viaduct. Wear proper shoes and bring rain gear! 

✨ The best and classic view is from the top of the main trail (to your left) to catch the first two trains going from Fort William to Mallaig. For the last two viewings, take the trail across the bridge to your right to see the train returning.

✨ You can also choose to ride the actual Jacobite train!! More info on that amazing experience to come! Stay tuned! 🚂

We were obsessed with the train and camped out all day in the rain to see all four viewings and the train from all possible angles 😂 What an unforgettable experience! 🙌🏻

📍Glenfinnan Viaduct, Scotland 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 

#hogwartsexpress #harrypotter #harrypotterfilm #glenfinnan #glenfinnanviaduct #jacobitesteamtrain #jacobite #wizardingworld #hogwartsismyhome #gryffindor @harrypotterfilm @wizardingworld

✨𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: 𝐉𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐞𝐲 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐝𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐇𝐨𝐠𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐬✨

‘𝘞𝘩𝘦𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳 𝘺𝘰𝘶 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘦 𝘣𝘢𝘤𝘬 𝘣𝘺 𝘱𝘢𝘨𝘦 𝘰𝘳 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘣𝘪𝘨 𝘴𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘦𝘯, 𝘏𝘰𝘨𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘴 𝘸𝘪𝘭𝘭 𝘢𝘭𝘸𝘢𝘺𝘴 𝘣𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘰 𝘸𝘦𝘭𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘦 𝘺𝘰𝘶 𝘩𝘰𝘮𝘦.’

Our epic Harry Potter trip has come to an end 🥹 For 2 weeks we road tripped across the UK, hitting iconic film locations and seeing the inspirations behind the story of the Boy who Lived⚡

I read the book when it was first published in 1997 and never in my life would I have imagined being able to experience the magic like this in real life! 🥹🪄 I am officially in love with the UK—the country, its history, and the people. I’m already trying to plan when to come back, because there is still so much to do! ❤️🇬🇧

Words can’t describe how grateful I am for these Harry Potter experiences, and in large part it’s due to the support from all of you on this account, so THANK YOU! 🫶🏻 I love interacting with you all and hearing about your own magical journeys. Stay tuned for more magical adventures, memories from this trip, and travel tips. I hope to have inspired you to take that Harry Potter trip you’ve been thinking about, because it’s pure magic and you will not regret! ❤️✨

Filming Locations:
📍King’s Cross, London, UK
📍Jacobite Train, Glenfinnan Viaduct, UK
📍Universal Orlando

As well, thank you to the @wbtourlondon and @minalimadesign teams, as well as the magical accommodations who hosted us, as it really made the trip special. And big thank you to the lovely people I got to meet in real life, @pensieve_pot @kookieandrookie and @thesortingkat who took time to show us around!! You guys are amazing! 🫶🏻 And of course the biggest thank you goes to my husband who has been a constant source of support and the reason why all this magical content can be brought to all of you!! He was the MVP of this trip! And even though he isn’t the biggest Potterhead, he said this was one of the best trips we’ve ever taken 😆⚡ (magic is real!)

#harrypotter #harrypotterfilm #instagramhusband #ighusband #wizardingworld #dobby #dobbyisfree #malfoy #luciusmalfoy #hogwarts

✨𝟏𝟎𝟏 𝐇𝐨𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐀𝐭 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐄𝐧𝐝. 𝐖𝐢𝐭𝐜𝐡𝐜𝐫𝐚𝐟𝐭 & 𝐖𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐫𝐲 𝐇𝐨𝐮𝐬𝐞✨

Want to know what it’s like to live like a witch and wizard? 🧙🏻‍♀️Then there’s no better stay then at @101houseattheend in York, UK 🇬🇧 This wizard-inspired AirBnB is perfect for a magical stay! | hosted

✨ You truly feel like you’re stepping into 12 Grimmauld Place or a wizarding home at @101houseattheend ⚡️
✨ 4 guests, 2 bedrooms, 3 beds and 1 bath
✨ Sleep in the iconic and opulent Emerald Bedchamber (Slytherin vibes that Mrs. Black would be proud of), or snuggle up in the cozy Victorian Reading Room (Bookworms will love this place!! so many reading nooks) 🐍
✨ Stunning Ministry of Magic inspired bathroom! Perfect place for a bubble bath 🛁
✨ I could not get enough of the unique decor and Dark Academia aesthetic; from potion bottles to an enchanted ceiling with floating candles, you can spend hours getting lost in all the details! 🕯️
✨ Free parking and smart TVs in every room (the parking was clutch for being able to visit the medieval city of York!)
✨ Stone’s throw (about 20-30min walk) to York city centre. It’s the best location to explore the Shambles (a real Diagon Alley), Yorks’ most famous and historic street that’s filled with Harry Potter shops and unique stores 🫶🏻
✨ It’s such a unique stay that 101 House At The End also made it to the finalists for Visit York 2024 Awards! 👏🏻

If you are coming to visit the historic city of York, then you must have a stay at 101 House at the End! We loved our stay so much, it was truly magical and we didn’t want to leave.

🎟️ Check out @101houseattheend for bookings! 💕

📍101 House at the End, York, UK

It’s here!! 🙌🏻 Prisoner of Azkaban is my all-time favourite Harry Potter book and I’m so excited that @minalimadesign released their illustrated edition of this book!! 🥰 This Prisoner of Azkaban did not disappoint!! 😍 It’s absolutely stunning and you can even hear me audibly gasp when I turn the page 😂 Here’s a mini flip through of what’s inside— but there’s still so much more!! ❤️👏🏻

@minalimadesign are the brilliant masterminds behind the look and feel of the Harry Potter movies and they have been releasing their own illustrated versions of the Harry Potter books, filled with interactive paper art and full-coloured illustrations on almost every page🫶🏻✨Thank you @miraphoramina and @limafilho for keeping the magic alive!

What’s your favourite detail?! I love spinning the teaspoon in the teacup to reveal the Grim!! 🐕‍🦺

#wizardingworld #harrypotter #minalima #minalimadesign #prisonerofazkaban #knightbus #siriusblack

Time to have a Halloween Feast!! 🎃 We tried a bunch of specialty food items from the Dark Arts Menu at @wbtourlondon and it did not disappoint! The food was SO good!! 🍽️😋

✨ @wbtourlondon releases a unique menu during their special events. The theme this season: Dark Arts 💀🐍
✨ Try some fun spooky treats at the Chocolate Frog Cafe, like the Blueberry and Lemon Boggart, Bellatrix Necklace Tart, Slytherin Brownie, and Death Eater Cake Pops!
✨ The lunch menu at the Food Hall was hearty and festive! Some items we tried included the Dark Mark Dog, House of Black Burger and Hagrid’s Pumpkin Patch Pizza 
✨ My absolute fav was Hagrid’s Pumpkin Patch Pizza!! 🎃🍕Omg who knew pumpkin and pizza would be such a savoury combo?! I seriously still dream of this pizza and could have had the whole thing to myself 🤤
✨ Other favs: Treacle Tart with Butterbeer Cream, Pumpkin Pasties, and Bellatrix Necklace Tart 🍰😋
✨ Pro Tip: Eat at the Food Hall and Chocolate Frog cafe because it’s way better than the food in the backlot! (@thesortingkat knows her stuff!!)

Thanks so much @thesortingkat for knowing how to eat well and treating us to this delicious meal!! 🥰🫶🏻😋

✨ 𝐇𝐨𝐠𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐭 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 ✨

Exploring Hogwarts at night 🖤 Do you have your Marauder’s Map ready? 🪄👣

Do you recognize this iconic staircase? Christchurch college in Oxford was where the Harry Potter movies were filmed 🪄 Here are some notable scenes: 

✨It was first seen when the new Hogwarts students meet Professor McGonagall at the top of the stairscase in Philosopher’s Stone

✨Next in Chamber of Secrets when Harry and Ron miss the Hogwarts Express and fly in the Ford Anglia; they enter only to come face to face with Filch

✨Flashback of Tom Riddle talking to Professor Dumbledore in Chamber of Secrets

We were able to sleep over at Christ Church college and it was an amazing feeling having this place to ourselves and getting to explore Hogwarts at night! 🤗

📍Christ Church College, UK 🇬🇧
